oai_dc:dc.dc:title: DEVELOPMENT OF A NEW TYPE OF REEF BREAKWATER THEORETICAL AND EXPERIMENTAL STUDY
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kakuno, Shohachi
Endoh, Masao
Zhong, Yiming
Shigematsu, Takaaki
Oda, Kazuki
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: breakwater
reef breakwater
breakwater design
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The concept of a horizontal perforated plate placed in water, with a method for implementing the concept in a real sea as a new type of reef breakwater, is proposed in the present paper. The feasibility and superiority of the proposed breakwater in hydraulic characteristics in comparison with conventional reef breakwaters has been shown by theoretical and experimental study.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 26 (1998): Proceedings of 26th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1998.
